summary: Scoped quality checks for project/agent_executor_v0. Track-only Level 2 safeguards; no blocking behavior outside the agent scope.
rule: Evaluate path policy, source-link coverage, and terminology compliance for agent outputs. Emit warnings and metrics only. Never auto-mutate and never create global hard gates.

checks.description: Outputs must remain under allowed contract paths.
Output artifacts should reference at least one source scene/task input.

next_steps: Track warning count trends in reports/kpi_dashboard_metrics_v0.json
Refine check definitions only via versioned updates
Keep gate scoped; do not escalate to global hard gate without explicit decision artifact
resumption_notes: Load meta/AGENT_EXECUTOR_CONTRACT_v0.md and scenes/agent_executor_v0.scene.json before evaluating output quality.
